title: test_reset_resource_group_vt_overflow failed when executing `make test`
body:
## Bug Report

```
running 1 test
thread 'resource_group::tests::test_reset_resource_group_vt_overflow' panicked at 'assertion failed: old_max_vt - RESET_VT_THRESHOLD < new_max_vt', components/resource_control/src/resource_group.rs:870:9
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
test resource_group::tests::test_reset_resource_group_vt_overflow ... FAILED

failures:

failures:
    resource_group::tests::test_reset_resource_group_vt_overflow
```
